text: is a Japanese voice actor. He is known for his role in voicing the character Rock Lee in the Naruto series. He has been involved in the voice acting industry since 1999. He has also voiced the characters Sibuxiang in Soul Hunter and Haruhiko "Uchi" Uchiyama in Gokusen. ==References== ==Other websites== * Anime News Network profile Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese voice actors Category:People from Kanagawa Prefecture
